beer.beer_description:
This medium bodied hazy really packs a punch with bright tangerine and stone fruit aroma and flavour from a selected combination of NZ and US Northwestern hops.
With a juicy slightly bitter backbone that leaves you craving more.

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 105 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 22!

beer.beer_description:

With a juicy slightly bitter backbone that leaves you craving more.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 425 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 86!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 325 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 66! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 135 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 28! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 270 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 55.

items.badge_description: Are you crazy? Five different types of beer in one day? Hope you were just sampling.
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 20 check-ins with a photo.

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 45 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 10!
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 30 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 7.

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 155 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 32!

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 5 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 2!
